page.title: 18Bright Steels-Facts/Figures
page.content: 160 people are employed. 35 employees are in management/office staff. 84 employees are on the factory floor. 4 employees are drivers. 30 employees are maintenance staff. 7 employees are involved in other various occupations. {The steel comes from 26 suppliers in {the United Kingdom. Bright Steels export their products to 20 countries including America, Canada,Australia,New Zealand and Isreal. {Bright Steels recently opened a sales {operation in Mexico and Venezuela. Bright Steels emblem is an otter because its independent outlook typifies the company's wish to remain its own master.
